txt.en:
'At your service, [placeholder]. We dwarves have toiled long under these Mountains and have crafted many wonderful and beautiful things as you no doubt can see. But the skill of the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall lies not in our mastery of stone and rock, but in the cutting of gemstones and the smithy of strong iron! Though we pride ourselves most on our jewel-crafting over any of our works of baser materials.

'If you bring to me finely-crafted dwarf-jewels, you might prove yourself someone of worth to the Dwarves of Thorin's Hall.
'You have returned with the dwarf-jewels. Splendid!'
'You have returned without the dwarf-jewels? I do not have time for idle craftsmen. Return when it is finished!'
The Dwarves of the Blue Mountains are known best for their jewel and iron-craft.
The Blue Stone Garrison is located just inside Thorin's Hall.\n\nÍsrath has requested that you bring him crafted dwarf-jewels.
